## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> value could potentially represent multiple visual objects during a single hit test. The hit test callback method defines the actions you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. After you perform the actions, you return a <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior> value that determines whether to continue the enumeration of any other visual objects. The order of enumeration of returned visual objects is by z-order on the rendering plane.
